properties.Name: SalesTerm
properties.Description:
A term or condition that may be applied to the sale of a product.

Ex.:
- Minimum order required
- Minimum order requires paid shipping and handling
- Duties and Taxes are responsibility of customer
- All sales are final 
- International credit cards not accepted
- No personal checks
- No business checks
- Government PO accepted
- Purchases via credit card will ship to credit card billing address only
- Payments via Money Order must be received within 14 days or order will be cancelled
- Exempt customer from credit checking
- Credit for exchanges will be only for identical product
- Returned products found to be non-defective will have a 20% handling charge applied
- Conditional upon verification of age
- Conditional upon verification of employment
- Conditional upon verification of residential location
- Conditional upon passing a medical examination
- Order is Cash Dated (a date is provided against which discounts etc. are applied)
- Sales Order is Date of Invoice (A date is provided against which prepayments begin with the invoice date)
- End of Month Sales Term Dating  (cash and net discount periods begin on first day of following month not on the invoice date)
- Receipt of Goods Payment (the time allowed for discounts and payments begin with the date the goods are received by the buyer)
- Advance Order (Invoice is postdated to allow for shipment of the merchandise)
- Extra Time Allowance (gives the retailer extra time to take the cash discount)

Columns.Name: SalesTermId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Sales Term.

Columns.Name: SalesTermName
Columns.Description: The name of the Sales Term.

Columns.Name: SalesTermDescription
Columns.Description: The description of the Sales Term.

A term or condition that may be applied to the sale of a product.
